text: Eddie Vedder (born Edward Louis Severson III; December 23, 1964) is an American musician, singer and songwriter."Something In The Way" . Salon.com. August 26, 1996. He is best known for being the lead singer and one of three guitarists of the alternative rock band Pearl Jam. He is commonly seen as an icon of alternative rock.White, Nicholas. "Eddie Vedder: Fatherhood 'Fueled My Anger' About World" . People. title: Eddie Vedder
